Overview

We want to create one of our childhood games which is still popular until now.

We are going to use a 3d perspective mixed with 2d perspective.

We also wanted to add additional features like the lighting and buffing food .

This is also our first game submission for GRAVAJAM with the tag "We can Do It!"
